question: Who among the following Governors- General introduced the Dual System of Government?
explanation: The Dual System of Government in Bengal was the brainchild of Lord Clive. At Murshidabad, there was a puppet Nawab sitting paying the company an annual allowance of Rs. 6 Lakh. The British Emperor Shah Aalam II came under the protection of the British and he would now stay at Allahabad.
